name: IRIS Elevated Feeder with Airtight Storage

reviews.name: IRIS Elevated Feeder with Airtight Storage
reviews.reviewText: I bought two elevated feeders, one in large and one in small. I have a lab and a small lab/dauchand mix. The sizes are perfect for both dogs. The large one stores about 20 lbs of food easily. With a scoop in each, it's easy to feed them. Our dog bowls were always being knocker over, spilling water everywhere. Now the floor is a lot cleaner!
reviews.title: Great buy!

reviews.name: IRIS Elevated Feeder with Airtight Storage
reviews.reviewText: Before I got this I had Our Pets Adjustable Feeder, it was ok, but I love this feeder!!! It has a seal, so the food stays nice & fresh & the container holds up to 47lbs of food. + my dog doesn't have to bend down to eat like he did on the other. It's the right height for him. If your looking for a dog feed, I would totally get this one :) :) My dog approves too ;)
reviews.title: Holds a lot of dog food!!!

reviews.name: IRIS Elevated Feeder with Airtight Storage
reviews.reviewText:
just what was needed for no more chucking up food. having her head above the floor level has improved her being able to hold down her meals.
border collie /Aussie head is 20 inches from floor - had the dishes been 1 inch higher would have been too high.
reviews.title: Ralph

reviews.name: IRIS Elevated Feeder with Airtight Storage
reviews.reviewText:
When I bought this I didn't realize the height but it does work for cats.
I have a 11yr old boy and he had a few issues and I was scared he would be leaving me,
but this has helped a bit with a change in food to make him alot better. He and his little
brother who is a year old sit at this dish and eat their food. They are tall enough sitting to eat and sit at the same time. And they are sitting perfectly upright. Glad I bought it. Works for cats as well. And with the bowls I can move the extra one on the floor for my lil girl who is rather short.
reviews.title: Really nice

reviews.name: IRIS Elevated Feeder with Airtight Storage
reviews.reviewText: My dog loves this feeder. I was worried about her neck, having to lean over so far....She is a happy camper now and so am I.....
reviews.title: Big Dog Munchies
